### Ingest
#### country, region, CPI score, standard error

```{r echo=TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, class.source='fold-hide'}

# Load
url_root <- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/UN-AVT/kamino-source/main/sources/0-shared/data/"
url_file <- "corruption-perception-index/corruption-perception-index-2020.csv"
url <- paste0(url_root, url_file)
df <- read.csv(url, header = TRUE)

df

```
### Missing Values
#### <kbd>check for each column</kbd>

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source = 'fold-show'}

  gather('Column name', 'Count of missing values')

missing_stats

```
